A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I want to give it 3 starts but it doesn't deserve it. Lazy plot and cheesy dialogues I still can process but editing in first 30 minutes was so bad that it really bothered me. I will write normal review when I process how disappoiting this film was. It would be a 3.5 or 4 star film if dialogues were good\, please don't make every movie Marvel. So bad.
